{{also|弼马温}}
==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=弼马温}}

===Etymology===
Homophone of {{zh-l|避馬瘟|to prevent horse's disease}} in Mandarin. It is thought that adding monkey's urine to the fodder for horses can prevent horses falling ill.
